delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Exercise Hint "{{ title }}"?

exerciseHint.title: Title
exerciseHint.taskTooltip: It is not recommended to assign code hints to other tasks since these are specifically generated for a task.
exerciseHint.displayThreshold: Unlock after number of unsuccessful submissions
exerciseHint.displayThresholdTooltip: The number of unsuccessful submissions for a task after which this hint should become available. Setting this value to zero means that the hint is always visible.
exerciseHint.descriptionTooltip: This text is displayed to students who are shown this hint.
exerciseHint.exerciseHintButtonTooltip: See available and activated hints for this exercise.
exerciseHint.availableHintsAlertMessage: New hints available for task '{{ taskName }}'.

studentDialog.activateTooltip: The hint will be activated and added to your displayed hints.
studentDialog.availableHintTaskDescription: Having issues solving the task '{{ taskName }}'? You can take a look at the following example solution.
